credit_line: Gift of the Williams College Alumni of New York City
title: Portrait of Albert Hopkins (1807-1872), Class of 1826, Williams College Tutor 1827-29 and Professor 1829-72
inscriptions: l.l. in oil: G.H.Wright./ 1872; u.r. of canvas on top stretcher edge in pencil: G.H. Wright/ 1872; verso u.c. on stretcher in white chalk: #7  PROF. ALBERT HOPKINS FRAME OK./ PRESENTED BY ALUMNI OF N.Y. CITY.
